languages.text: "Такая же тюрьма для Осколка, как и та, что перед нами, но... лучше. Ярмо измыслили лучшие умы двух народов, оттолкнувшись от мудрости ушедшей ксенорасы. Темница, способная не только удерживать в себе К'тан, но и контролировать, выпуская на волю часть его сущности. Инструмент послушания и уничтожения. Шедевр, сотворение которого потребовало привлечения огромных сил".

"A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan Shard, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."
languages.original_text: "Такая же тюрьма для Осколка, как и та, что перед нами, но... лучше. Ярмо измыслили лучшие умы двух народов, оттолкнувшись от мудрости ушедшей ксенорасы. Темница, способная не только удерживать в себе К'тан, но и контролировать, выпуская на волю часть его сущности. Инструмент послушания и уничтожения. Шедевр, сотворение которого потребовало привлечения огромных сил".

traits.locale_text: "The Shard that is similar to that we now see right in front of us, but... better. The best scholars of two races had been researching it, using the wisdom of the ancient xenos race that left a long time ago. The prison that is not just capable of holding C'Tan in place, but to control it as well, by releasing the parts of his entity. The instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece, the creation of which required an enormous amount of force."

"The Shard that is similar to that we now see right in front of us, but... better. The best scholars of two races had been researching it, using the wisdom of the ancient xenos race that left a long time ago. The prison that is not just capable of holding C'Tan in place, but to control it as well, by releasing the parts of his entity. The instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece, the creation of which required an enormous amount of force."

"The Shard that is similar to the one we now see right in front of us, except it's... better. The leading scholars of two races were devising it, using the wisdom of the ancient xenos race that had been gone a long time ago. The prison that is not just capable of holding the C'Tan in place, but to control him as well, by releasing parts of his entity. The instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece, whose creation required a ton of force."

"The Shard that is similar to the one we now see right in front of us, except it's... better. The leading scholars of two races were devising it, using the wisdom of the ancient xenos race that had been gone a long time ago. The prison that is not just capable of holding the C'Tan in place, but to control him as well, by releasing parts of his entity. The instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece, whose creation required a ton of force."

"A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."

"A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan Shard, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'un dispositif de confinement semblable à celui-ci, sauf qu'il est... supérieur. Il a été conçu par les plus brillants esprits de deux races qui ont puisé dans la sagesse d'une civilisation xénos disparue depuis bien longtemps. C'est une prison capable non seulement de retenir le C'tan, mais aussi de le contrôler, en libérant d'infimes parties de son entité. C'est un instrument d'obéissance et de destruction, un chef-d'œuvre dont la création a nécessité des efforts considérables. »
languages.original_text: "A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan Shard, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit d'un dispositif de confinement semblable à celui-ci, sauf qu'il est... supérieur. Il a été conçu par les plus brillants esprits de deux races, en utilisant la sagesse d'une civilisation xénos disparue depuis bien longtemps. C'est une prison capable non seulement de retenir le C'tan, mais aussi de le contrôler, en libérant des parties de son entité. C'est un instrument d'obéissance et de destruction, un chef-d'œuvre dont la création a nécessité des efforts considérables. »

languages.text: «Un dispositivo de contención similar a este, pero... mejor. El Yugo es el fruto de las mentes más brillantes de dos razas, nacido a partir del conocimiento ancestral de una civilización xenos perdida hace milenios. Una prisión capaz no solo de reprimir el fragmento de C'tan, sino también de controlarlo y liberar fracciones de su ser. Un instrumento de obediencia y destrucción. Una obra maestra cuya creación solo fue posible gracias a un esfuerzo titánico».
languages.original_text: "A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan Shard, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."

traits.locale_text: «Un dispositivo de contención similar al que tenemos frente a nosotros, pero... mejor. Lo desarrollaron los mejores eruditos de dos razas con el saber de la raza xenos ancestral que desapareció hace mucho tiempo. Una prisión no solo capaz de mantener al C'Tan atrapado, sino también de controlarlo liberando partes de su entidad. Un instrumento de obediencia y destrucción. Una obra maestra cuya creación requirió una fuerza inmensa».

languages.text: “是一种束缚装置，与这个装置很相似，但却……更加强大。两个种族最杰出的学者，利用早已散佚的远古异形文明智慧，设计出了‘圣枷’这个装置。这种束缚装置不仅能牢牢地困住星神碎片，还可以将碎片的一部分实体释放出来，由此对它进行控制。这件工具可以用来降服碎片，毁灭敌人。制造出这样的杰作，需要海量的人力物力。”
languages.original_text: "A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan Shard, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."

traits.locale_text: “是一种束缚装置，与我们目前看到的装置很相似，只是……更加强大。两个种族最出色的学者，曾经利用早已散佚的远古异形智慧，设计出了这个装置。这种束缚装置不仅能牢牢地困住星神，还可以将星神的一部分实体释放出来，由此对星神进行控制。这件工具可以用来降服星神，毁灭敌人。制造出这样的杰作，需要海量的人力物力。”

languages.text: "Ein Eindämmungsgerät ähnlich wie diesem, nur ... besser. Das Joch wurde von den führenden Gelehrten zweier Spezies konzipiert, auf Basis der uralten Weisheiten einer längst ausgestorbenen Xenos-Zivilisation. Ein Gefängnis, welches das C'tan-Fragment nicht nur einschließen kann, sondern auch kontrollieren, indem Teile seines Wesens kontrolliert freigelassen werden. Ein Instrument von Gehorsam und Zerstörung. Ein Meisterwerk, für dessen Herstellung gewaltige Kräfte nötig waren."
languages.original_text: "A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan Shard, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."

traits.locale_text: "Das Fragment ähnlich wie dem, das wir vor uns sehen, nur ... besser. Die führenden Gelehrten zweier Spezies haben es konzipiert, auf Basis der Weisheiten der uralten Xenos-Spezies, die schon lange verschwunden ist. Das Gefängnis, das den C'tan nicht nur einschließen kann, sondern auch kontrollieren, indem Teile seines Wesens kontrolliert freigelassen werden. Das Instrument von Gehorsam und Zerstörung. Ein Meisterwerk, für dessen Herstellung gewaltige Kräfte nötig waren."

languages.text: 「これと似た制御装置だが…より優れている。ヨークは、2つの種族を代表する学者が、はるか昔に滅びた古代ゼノの知恵を駆使して考案したものだ。ク＝タン・シャードを固定するだけでなく、その実体の一部を解放することで制御することもできる牢獄だ。服従と破壊の道具。その創造には膨大な力が必要だった」
languages.original_text: "A containment device similar to this one, except... better. The Yoke was devised by the brightest minds of two races using the ancient wisdom of a long-gone xenos civilisation. A prison capable not only of holding the C'tan Shard, but also of controlling it while releasing fractions of its being. An instrument of obedience and destruction. A masterpiece whose creation required immense effort."

traits.locale_text: 「シャードは今目の前にあるものとよく似ている。それは…より優れているものであることを除けばな。2つの種族を代表する学者が、はるか昔に滅びた古代の異種族の知恵を駆使して考案したものだ。ク＝タンを固定するだけでなく、その実体の一部を解放することでコ制御することもできる牢獄だ。服従と破壊の道具。その創造には膨大な力が必要だった」
